nodes.text: Byblos Drive Yards was a company that produced the G-1A starfighter. The company designed the starfighter as an all-purpose system patrol craft and left ample room for upgrades and additions to the vessel's stock systems. Byblos envisioned producing several aftermarket weapon and sensor packages for the G-1A, but only a few were ever built, as the vehicle never gained the popularity or sales numbers that were expected, causing the company to drastically scaled back production.

In the new Star Wars canon, Byblos Drive Yards was first mentioned in the 2017 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying sourcebook No Disintegrations. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was created by Bill Smith for the 1993 reference book The Essential Guide to Vehicles and Vessels.
